RelatedSentence: India is taking a calculated risk with the election of Narendra Modi as prime minister , Indian business leader and public intellectual Gurcharan Das told CNN 's Christiane Amanpour on Monday .
Modi , leader of the Bharatiya Janata Party , claimed victory in a landslide election last Friday .

A0: Mr. Modi , a duly elected leader of the largest secular republic on earth
RelatedSentence: He has drawn praise for the economic revitalization of Gujarat , his home state , but criticism over his Hindu nationalism and alleged role in anti-Muslim mob violence a decade ago , when he was chief minister of Gujarat .
The country has seen lacklustre GDP growth , for a developing country , at just under five percent annualized growth in 2013 .
Modi , Das told Amanpour , is the country 's best chance to revive growth .
India 's major problem is that government is all gummed up , Das said .

A0: Mr. Modi , a duly elected leader of the largest secular republic on earth
RelatedSentence: He was critized for not doing enough to stop the violence , in which more than 1,000 people - mostly Muslims - were killed .

A1: Mr. Modi , a duly elected leader of the largest secular republic on earth
RelatedSentence: A Supreme Court - ordered investigation absolved him of blame last year .

A0: Mr. Modi , a duly elected leader of the largest secular republic on earth
RelatedSentence: Modi subsequently expressed regret over the riots but was criticized for not apologizing .
Apologizing , Das said , would be the wise and magnanimous thing to do .
The threat India faces , Das said , is not China , nor long - time rival Pakistsan .
The threat India faces , Das said , is not China , nor long - time rival Pakistsan .
Mr Modi 's colossal victory in the largest secular democracy on earth by the largest number of votes in human history can not be ignored any longer by his critics and detractors .
President Obama needs to urgently repair the Bush era debacle of denying visas to Mr Modi as soon as possible .

A1: era debacle of denying visas to
RelatedSentence: President Obama needs to urgently repair the Bush era debacle of denying visas to Mr Modi as soon as possible .

A1: Mr. Modi , a duly elected leader of the largest secular republic on earth
RelatedSentence: This is because Mr Modi was cleared by the courts in India for any wrong doing and was not held responsible for actions taken by others in a communal riot situation resulting in both Hindu and Muslim deaths , any more than President Obama is personally responsible for the Benghazi incident .

This is because Mr Modi was cleared by the courts in India for any wrong doing and was not held responsible for actions taken by others in a communal riot situation resulting in both Hindu and Muslim deaths , any more than President Obama is personally responsible for the Benghazi incident .
We have no right convicting a man in court of public opinion when he was clearly found not guilty of any crime by the legal courts .

President Obama and CNN , and the media need to embrace Mr. Modi , a duly elected leader of the largest secular republic on earth to set a good example for others to follow by quashing racial discrimination , bigotry and Hinduphobia .

Dear Christine , Hindus are peace loving people and so is Mr.Modi.A Hindu can not be a fundamentalist as he believes the soul of every living being to be a particle of the Almighty.India has been facing terrorism for very long and the threat persists continuously.India has gladly and optimistically voted for Mr Modi because he has proved his capability.Three inquiries were set up against him by the previous Govts to investigate his role in riots that erupted after a train full of Hindu pilgrims was burnt , but nothing was found against him.Even the supreme court of India has declared him innocent .
